draft.aria-discardNote: discard the draft and return to notes
draft.warn-minLength: The note must contain at least {min} characters to be saved
draft.warn-maxLength: The note must be shorter than {max} characters to be saved

errors.invalid-note: Invalid note text was provided. Note text must contain only characters.
errors.invalid-search: Invalid search query was provided. The search must contain only characters.
errors.invalid-id: Invalid note id was provided. The note id must be a number.
